definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: kindle, burn (Sir 43:4 marg. [[הִסִּיק]], v:Sir 43:21, v:Sir 43:23 [[הִשִּׂיק]], burn; Aram. (also BA) [[סְלַק]] ascend, Aph. cause to go up (in flame), offer sacrifice; slem, Palm. [[סלק]] ascend);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[אֵשׁ נִשְּׂקָה בְיַעֲקׂב]] Ps 78:21 a fire was kindled against Jacob.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: make a fire burn: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְהִשִּׂיקוּ]], c. [[ב]] rei; Impf. 3 ms. abs. [[יְשִּׂיק]] Is 44:15 (both ‖[[בִּעֵר ]]).
